modelIdentification.name: AFMSTT Mision Status Module
modelIdentification.purpose: Monitor the progress of air missions defined in the USMTF Air Tasking Order (ATO).
modelIdentification.description: Monitor the progress of air missions defined in the USMTF Air Tasking Order (ATO).
modelIdentification.useHistory: 1.0r2 Release Notes - Add TimeOnTarget to AirMission. Replace AlertLocation with Latitude, Longitude, and Altitude in AgileClientAlert.
1.0r3 - Remove Force DDM dimension from all interactions. They lack the parameters needed to use this.

objectClass.name: AirMissionElement
objectClass.semantics: Defines one element in the air plan for an Air Mission.

attribute.name: Force
attribute.semantics: The force of the organization that will conduct this mission.

attribute.name: Latitude
attribute.semantics: Latitude component of destination location (required). Does not include intermediate route waypoints or refueling locations.

attribute.name: Longitude
attribute.semantics: Longitude component of destination location (required). Does not include intermediate route waypoints or refueling locations.

attribute.name: Altitude
attribute.semantics: Destination altitude (in meters) above mean sea level (optional).

attribute.name: LocationName
attribute.semantics: Name associated with the destination location (optional). For Targeting missions, this is the same as the target name. Equivalent to FIELD 5 OF SET GTGTLOC (TARGET/FACILITY NAME) in the ATO.

attribute.name: TimePlannedOn
attribute.semantics: Date/time at which this event is planned to begin (required). Derived from the mission times in the ATO. Corresponds to the "Planned On" field in the TMBCS ESTAT display.

attribute.name: TimePlannedOff
attribute.semantics: Date/time at which this event is planned to end (optional). Derived from the mission times in the ATO. Corresponds to the "Planned Off" field in the TMBCS ESTAT display.

attribute.name: TimeEstimatedOn
attribute.semantics: Date/time at which this event is estimated to end (optional). Updated by the command that will execute this mission. Corresponds to the "Estimated Off" field in the TMBCS ESTAT display.

attribute.name: TimeEstimatedOff
attribute.semantics: Date/time at which this event is estimated to begin (optional). Updated by the command that will execute this mission. Corresponds to the "Estimated On" field in the TMBCS ESTAT display.

attribute.name: TimeActualOn
attribute.semantics: Date/time at which this event is estimated to begin (optional). Updated by the command that will execute this mission. Corresponds to the "Estimated On" field in the TMBCS ESTAT display. Not used for takeoff or landing events.

attribute.name: TimeActualOff
attribute.semantics: Date/time at which this event is estimated to begin (optional). Updated by the command that will execute this mission. Corresponds to the "Estimated On" field in the TMBCS ESTAT display.

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the force that the mission belongs to.

attribute.name: PlannedAirEventList
attribute.semantics: List of references to the Planned AirEvents for this mission, sorted in the order in which they will occur. Take off and landing are specified using the times in the AirMission itself, instead of being included in the air plan.

attribute.name: AirEventList
attribute.semantics: List of references to the Executing AirEvents for this mission, sorted in the order in which they will occur. Take off and landing are specified using the times in the AirMission itself, instead of being included in the air plan.

attribute.name: AirEventCurrent
attribute.semantics: Index of the current event in the AirEventList. The index number for the first number is zero. There is no active event if this variable is missing or less than zero.

attribute.name: ParentElement
attribute.semantics: References to the AirMissionElement that includes this mission or event. Missions may refer to other missions if they are suborindate elements of a package. Events may refer to other events if they are suborindate events in the mission. Primary events in the mission always point to the mission.

attribute.name: Status
attribute.semantics: Current status of this air mission or event.

objectClass.name: AirEvent
objectClass.semantics: Defines one element in the air plan for an Air Mission.

attribute.name: PriorityCode
attribute.semantics: Priority code for this target (required). Example "1A". Equivalent to the TARGET PRIORITY field of GTGLOC, MTGTLOC, and SHIPTGT lines of the ATO. Assume that mission priorities csn be sorted in alpha-numeric order.

attribute.name: AirRoute
attribute.semantics: Route used to reach destination.

attribute.name: Destination
attribute.semantics: Destination for this event. This can be a reference to an air space, platform, or aggregate. For a TargetingEvent, this is a reference to the target.

attribute.name: Course
attribute.semantics:
The angle/degree the aircraft should take for take off.
For this example, the course is 0. FOR kbad SCRAMBLE 1 FROM 12FS MISSION# 1112 CALLSIGN THOR12 ATOID LM38 0 250 30000

attribute.name: Speed
attribute.semantics:
The speed to use for this air event. In this example, speed is 250.
FOR kbad SCRAMBLE 1 FROM 12FS MISSION# 1112 CALLSIGN THOR12 ATOID LM38 0 250 30000

attribute.name: Duration
attribute.semantics: This is how long the Assign Airspace should be in affect. There is a start and end time on the Actual ACM, but for planning purposes, the duration will be used. The time is Game time in minutes.

attribute.name: Cause
attribute.semantics: Some AWSIM orders have a need to put a cause. "Why are we doing this event?". This is an optional attribute.

attribute.name: PlannedAircraftNumber
attribute.semantics: The planned number of aircraft for this event.

attribute.name: ActualAircraftNumber
attribute.semantics: The actual number of aircraft to fly this event.

attribute.name: SCLList
attribute.semantics: A list of all the Standard Configuration Loads (SCL) for this event

attribute.name: NatoIFFTransponderID
attribute.semantics: This is a pointer to the RTI ID of the NatoIffTransponder for this event.

attribute.name: IFF_Data
attribute.semantics: An array of IFF Data for this event. This will map to the NatoIffTransponder.EntityIdentifier field.

attribute.name: TimeUsage
attribute.semantics: For an AWSIM order, how is the time to be used. as an AT, PAT, END, etc.

objectClass.name: AirLocation
objectClass.semantics: Defines a mission element that directs aircraft to a specific locations. Based on the AMSNLOC set in the ATO.

attribute.name: Backwards
attribute.semantics: For an AWSIM order, should the order be flown backwards (in reverse order).

objectClass.name: AssignAirspaceEvent
objectClass.semantics: For an AWSIM order, An airspace is assigned to be flown for the event. But, how will this airspace be used. The object represents specific information for the usage of an airspace.

attribute.name: ContinueWhenExpired
attribute.semantics: True if the aircraft should continue flying the pattern if the airspace has expired.

attribute.name: Usage
attribute.semantics: How will this airspace be utilized. AirRoute, AirCorridor, AirControlPoint, etc.

attribute.name: bingoMode
attribute.semantics: How should the Bingo event be flown, Normal, COMBAT, DIRECT.

objectClass.name: AirMove
objectClass.semantics: Defines a mission element that moves airlifts assets from one location to another. Based on the AIRMOVE set in the ATO.

attribute.name: LegIdentificationNumber
attribute.semantics: The identifying number assigned to a single leg of a mission. Equivalent to FIELD 1 OF SET AIRMOVE (LEG IDENTIFICATION NUMBER) in the ATO.

attribute.name: MissionLegIdentifier
attribute.semantics: ICAO Base Code (ex: KPOB) or Geolocation Code (ex: G:LET3) for a military organization or a place with military significance. Equivalent to FIELD 3 OF SET AIRMOVE (MISSION LEG IDENTIFIER) in the ATO.

attribute.name: CrewType
attribute.semantics: Defines the type of crew used for this mission. Equivalent to FIELD 4 OF SET AIRMOVE (CREW TYPE) in ATO.

attribute.name: AirliftDeliveryMethod
attribute.semantics: The method of delivery for personnel or cargo by an airlift aircraft.

attribute.name: ReasonForStop
attribute.semantics: Reason for termination of an air move mission. Part of FIELD 7 OF SET AIRMOVE (AMC PURPOSE CODE) in the ATO.

attribute.name: OtherAirliftActivity
attribute.semantics: An alternative reason an airlift aircraft stops at an airfield. Part of FIELD 7 OF SET AIRMOVE (AMC PURPOSE CODE) in the ATO.

attribute.name: DeviationReason
attribute.semantics: The reason an airlift aircraft deviates from a planned path. Part of FIELD 7 OF SET AIRMOVE (AMC PURPOSE CODE) in the ATO.

attribute.name: RequirementNumber
attribute.semantics: Cross reference to the requirement number that this mission satisfies. Equivalent to in the ATO.

attribute.name: RouteComment
attribute.semantics: Free text comments from the ATO.

objectClass.name: AirDrop
objectClass.semantics: Defines the attributes for Air Drop missions. Based on the ATO AIRDROP.

attribute.name: GeodeticDatum
attribute.semantics: The code for the point of reference from which the coordinates for points in specific geodetic surveys and triangulation networks are computed. Equivalent to FIELD 3 OF SET AIRDROP (GEODETIC DATUM) in ATO.

attribute.name: RunInHeading
attribute.semantics: The magnetic heading of an aircraft when approaching a target/object. Equivalent to FIELD 4 OF SET AIRDROP (RUN-IN HEADING IN DEGREES) in ATO.

attribute.name: LeadingEdgeDistance
attribute.semantics: The distance from the leading edge of a drop zone to the point of impact. Equivalent to FIELD 5 OF SET AIRDROP (DISTANCE BETWEEN LEADING EDGE IMPACT POINT IN METERS) in ATO.

attribute.name: DropZoneLength
attribute.semantics: Length of the drop zone. Equivalent to FIELD 6 OF SET AIRDROP (DROP ZONE LENGTH IN METERS) in ATO.

attribute.name: DropZoneWidth
attribute.semantics: Length of the drop zone. Equivalent to FIELD 7 OF SET AIRDROP (DROP ZONE WIDTH IN METERS) in ATO.

attribute.name: FriendlyMarking
attribute.semantics: The method of marking friendly positions as a navigational identifier, other friendly identification function, or for protection from friendly fire or aircraft attacks. Equivalent to FIELD 8 OF SET AIRDROP (METHOD OF MARKING FRIENDLY POSITIONS) in ATO.

attribute.name: MarkingColor
attribute.semantics: Color uses for FriendlyMarking. Equivalent to FIELD 9 OF SET AIRDROP (COLOR) in ATO.

objectClass.name: TargetingEvent
objectClass.semantics: Information common to all targeting events.

attribute.name: AlternateDesignator
attribute.semantics: False for primary targets, true for alternate targets (optional). Defaults to false.

attribute.name: ComponentTargetIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifier defined by the component that nominated this target. Equivalent to FIELD 12 OF SET GTGTLOC, FIELD 14 OF SET SHIPTGT, and FIELD 12 OF SET MTGTLOC (COMPONENT TARGET IDENTIFIER) in the ATO.

attribute.name: TargetType
attribute.semantics: The basic design, configuration or primary function for which a target was designed and constructed or converted. Equivalent to FIELD 7 OF SET GTGTLOC (TARGET TYPE) and FIELD 6 OF SET SHIPTGT (SHIP TYPE, CATEGORY) in the ATO.

attribute.name: TargetObjective
attribute.semantics: The desired results after the target is attacked. Equivalent to Field 14 of Set GTGTLOC, Field 11 of Set MTGTLOC, and Field 11 of Set SHIPTGT in ATO.

attribute.name: TimeOnTarget
attribute.semantics: Optimal time for this engagement. Equivalent to Field 2 of Set GTGTLOC Field 3 of Set MTGTLOC Field 2 of Set SHIPTGT in ATO. For these missions, the TimePlannedOn and the TimePlannedOn/TimePlannedOff are used to represent the No Eariler Time (NET) and No Later Than Time (NLT) respectively. The Time On Target shall be used for these attributes if NET or NLT is not provided in the ATO.

attribute.name: Loft
attribute.semantics: Used in Bombing missions. Proceed to the specified distance for the attack.

attribute.name: StandOff
attribute.semantics: In Nautical Miles, proceed to specified distance to attack.

objectClass.name: GroundTarget
objectClass.semantics: Defines an attack against a ground target using air assets. Based on the ATO GTGLOC Ground Target Location.

attribute.name: TargetIdentifier
attribute.semantics: BE number, PIN number, theater target number, or a unique identification scheme designated by the operational commander (optional). Equivalent to FIELD 6 OF SET GTGTLOC (TARGET IDENTIFIER) in the ATO.

attribute.name: DMPI
attribute.semantics: Reference to the desired mean point of impact (DMPI) for this mission (optional). DMPI objects are published as part of the JLVC-Intel module. Equivalent to FIELD 11 OF SET GTGTLOC (DESIRED MEAN POINT OF IMPACT ELEVATION IN FEET OR METERS) in the ATO.

attribute.name: DMPI_Array
attribute.semantics: List of several DMPIs to attack for this event. Reference to the desired mean point of impact (DMPI) for this mission (optional). DMPI objects are published as part of the JLVC-Intel module. Equivalent to FIELD 11 OF SET GTGTLOC (DESIRED MEAN POINT OF IMPACT ELEVATION IN FEET OR METERS) in the ATO.

attribute.name: Ripple_All
attribute.semantics: True if all munitions on board are to be shot. Otherwise, the ripple LIst will have data to specifiy details of munition distribution. This data is typically found in the comment line of a USMTF Message.

attribute.name: RippleList
attribute.semantics: A list of Munitions type, amounts and where to get the munitions to shoot. Specific details of munition distribution. This data is typically found in the comment line of a USMTF Message.

objectClass.name: MissileTarget
objectClass.semantics: Defines an attack against a ground target using missile assets. Based on the ATO MGTGLOC Missile Target Location.

attribute.name: MissileType
attribute.semantics: Type of missile to use in the engagement. Equivalent to FIELD 8 OF SET MTGTLOC (TYPE OF MISSILE) in ATO. In the ATO, these values are limited to ATACM, CALCM, JASSM, TLAM CRUISE MISSILE, and Other.

attribute.name: NumberOfMissiles
attribute.semantics: Number of missiles to use in this engagement. Equivalent to FIELD 9 OF SET MTGTLOC (NUMBER OF MISSILES) in ATO.

objectClass.name: ShipTarget
objectClass.semantics: Defines an attack against a ship target using air assets. Based on the ATO SHIPTGT Ship Target.

attribute.name: ThreatLevel
attribute.semantics: Threat posture of the target (Friendly, Hostile, etc.) as perceived by the reporting station (required). Equivalent to FIELD 5 OF SET SHIPTGT (SHIP TARGET IDENTITY) in the ATO.

attribute.name: HullNumber
attribute.semantics: A number assigned to a specific vessel, which when associated with a specific hull type or class of vessel, uniquely identifies that vessel (optional). Equivalent to FIELD 7 OF SET SHIPTGT (HULL NUMBER) in ATO.

attribute.name: PositionDayTime
attribute.semantics: Date/time at which the position, course, and speed of the target were reported (required). Equivalent to FIELD 12 OF SET SHIPTGT (POSITION DAY-TIME) in ATO.

attribute.name: Course
attribute.semantics: The direction of travel of the target relative to true north (optional). Used to dead reckon the location of the target. Equivalent to FIELD 15 OF SET SHIPTGT (COURSE, DEGREES TRUE) in ATO.

attribute.name: Velocity
attribute.semantics: The speed of travel in meters/sec (optional). Used to dead reckon the location of the target. Equivalent to FIELD 16 OF SET SHIPTGT (SPEED IN KNOTS) in ATO.

objectClass.name: ReconTarget
objectClass.semantics:
Defines a reconnaissance mission using air assets. Based on the ATO RECCEDAT Ship Target.
Needs work!!!

attribute.name: LatestTimeOfValue
attribute.semantics: The date-time after which the information is no longer of value. Equivalent to FIELD 6 OF SET RECCEDAT (LATEST TIME OF VALUE, DATE-TIME GROUP) in ATO.

attribute.name: ReconnaissanceMissionType
attribute.semantics: Code for the type of reconnaissance/surveillance mission. Equivalent to FIELD 7 OF SET RECCEDAT (RECONNAISSANCE MISSION TYPE) in ATO.

attribute.name: ReconnaissanceCoverageType
attribute.semantics: Type of reconnaissance/surveillance coverage. Equivalent to FIELD 8 OF SET RECCEDAT (TYPE OF RECONNAISSANCE/SURVEILLANCE COVERAGE) in ATO.

attribute.name: ImageryType
attribute.semantics: Type of imagery recording used in a reconnaisance mission.

attribute.name: ImageQualifier
attribute.semantics: The film based on type of imagery the interpreter is viewing vice the original film negative type.

attribute.name: CoverageExtentAndMode
attribute.semantics: Defines the visibility of target and mode of coverage. Equivalent to FIELD 11 OF SET RECCEDAT (COVERAGE EXTENT AND MODE) in the ATO.

attribute.name: ReconPurpose
attribute.semantics: Purpose of a reconnaissance request. Equivalent to FIELD 12 OF SET RECCEDAT (RECONNAISSANCE PURPOSE) in the ATO.

attribute.name: IntelTaskCode
attribute.semantics: Intelligence task to be performed on the reconnaissance mission. Equivalent to FIELD 13 OF SET RECCEDAT (INTELLIGENCE TASK CODE) in the ATO.

attribute.name: ComponentTargetIdentification
attribute.semantics: ATO RECCEDAT.Component Target Identification 1-12 ANBS Optional - THE IDENTIFIER OR NUMBER ASSIGNED TO A TARGET BY A COMPONENT. [LITERAL] AN ALPHANUMERIC OR LITERAL SYMBOL IDENTIFYING A PARTICULAR ITEM OF A SEQUENCE OR SERIES.

attribute.name: TargetCategoryCode
attribute.semantics: Classification of a general group of targets.

attribute.name: TargetCategoryEeiCode
attribute.semantics:
ATO RECCEDAT.Target Cat EEI Code 2-6ANS Mandatory - THE CODE FOR THE TARGET CATEGORY ESSENTIAL ELEMENTS OF INFORMATION (EEI) THAT REPRESENTS THE RECONNAISSANCE (RECCE) OBJECTIVES ASSOCIATED WITH INDIVIDUAL TARGET CATEGORIES CONSIDERED TO BE OF CONTINUING TACTICAL VALUE. FOR FURTHER U.S. IMPLEMENTATION GUIDANCE, SEE JIEO CIRCULAR 9152, ITEM 176.
Need to enumerate codes: SEE ATO TARGET CATEGORY EEI CODE CODES ... way too many codes to paste here.

objectClass.name: AirRefuel
objectClass.semantics:
Defines an air-to-air fueling event. Based on the ARINFO set in the ATO. The Desination field in the partent class represents the air refueling control point (FIELD 4 OF SET ARINFO).
Still needs: 9 PRIMARY FREQUENCY 10 SECONDARY FREQUENCY 11 LINK 16 ABBREVIATED CALL SIGN 12 TYPE OF REFUELING AIRCRAFT 13 AERIAL REFUELING SYSTEM 14 NUMBER OF AIRCRAFT IN CELL 15 CELL SEQUENCE NUMBER(S) 16 TACAN CHANNEL, RECEIVER AND TANKER 17 BEACON

attribute.name: FuelMissionNumber
attribute.semantics: he identifying number assigned to a specific mission within an approved project, task, operation, or exercise (required). May include numbers, letters, spaces, and punctuation (ex: D123HA). Equivalent to FIELD 2 OF SET ARINFO (MISSION NUMBER) in the ATO.

attribute.name: FuelSource
attribute.semantics: Reference to the aircraft unit that is providing the fuel.

attribute.name: OffloadFuel
attribute.semantics: Fuel to be loaded in kilo-pounds.

objectClass.name: AirMission
objectClass.semantics: Individual unit task from an Air Task Order (ATO). The Time On and Time Off Fields in the parent object represent the takeoff and landing times for this mission.

attribute.name: ATOIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Serial number of the ATO from which this mission was defined. Equivalent to the FIELD 3 OF SET MSGID (MESSAGE SERIAL NUMBER) in the ATO.

attribute.name: TaskCountry
attribute.semantics: Country tasked to execute this mission (required). Equivalent to FIELD 1 OF SET TSKCNTRY (COUNTRY OF THE WORLD) in the ATO.

attribute.name: TaskService
attribute.semantics: Service branch tasked to execute this mission (required). Equivalent to FIELD 1 OF SET SVCTASK (TASKED SERVICE) in the ATO.

attribute.name: MissionNumber
attribute.semantics: The identifying number assigned to a specific mission within an approved project, task, operation, or exercise (required). May include numbers, letters, spaces, and punctuation (ex: D123HA). Equivalent to FIELD 2 OF SET AMSNDAT (MISSION NUMBER) in the ATO.

attribute.name: PackageIdentifier
attribute.semantics: FIELD 1 OF SET 9PKGDAT (PACKAGE IDENTIFICATION)Package identification for a collection of missions. Equivalent to FIELD 1 OF SET 9PKGDAT (PACKAGE IDENTIFICATION) in the ATO. Required if ParentMissionIdentifier is used.

attribute.name: CallSign
attribute.semantics: Call sign for this mission. This is normally the same as Marking of the Flight Lead. But, it is included here because the Flight may be filtered out by DDM.

attribute.name: MissionTypePrimary
attribute.semantics: Preferred type or designation for a tasked air mission (required). Equivalent to FIELD 6 OF SET AMSNDAT (PRIMARY MISSION TYPE) in the ATO.

attribute.name: MissionTypeSecondary
attribute.semantics: Alternate type or designation for a tasked air mission (optional). Equivalent to FIELD 7 OF SET AMSNDAT (PRIMARY MISSION TYPE) in the ATO.

attribute.name: TaskedUnit
attribute.semantics: Reference to the AggregateEntity that will execute this mission. Derived from the TASKUNIT SET in the ATO.

attribute.name: MissionStatus
attribute.semantics: Mission status as defined in the MRF-W FOM.

attribute.name: AlertStatus
attribute.semantics: Readiness status expressed as an indication of the time specified or implied for an aircraft to be airborne after the launch order is received or the time required for a missile unit to assume battle stations.

attribute.name: HomeBase
attribute.semantics: Reference to the AirBase that owns the tasked unit.

attribute.name: DepartureBase
attribute.semantics: Reference to the AirBase from which this mission will depart. Equivalent to the DEPARTURE LOCATION field of the AMSNDAT line of the ATO.

attribute.name: RecoveryBase
attribute.semantics: Reference to the AirBase to which this mission will return. Equivalent to the RECOVERY LOCATION field of the AMSNDAT line of the ATO.

attribute.name: PrimaryDivertBase
attribute.semantics: From Matthew's class decomposition (flight)

attribute.name: SecondaryDivertBase
attribute.semantics: From Matthew's class decomposition (flight)

attribute.name: TertiaryDivertBase
attribute.semantics: From Matthew's class decomposition (flight)

attribute.name: ForwardOperatingBase
attribute.semantics: If the squadron is currently assigned to a Forward Operating Location (FOL), this holds the reference to the squadron's current assignment. Empty or blank indicates that this squadron is not FOL.

attribute.name: Squadron
attribute.semantics: Reference to the squadron to which this mission is currently assigned (required). May change if the squadron is split during forward operating location deployment or diversion.

attribute.name: TimeOnTarget
attribute.semantics: Optimal time for this engagement. Equivalent to Field 2 of Set GTGTLOC Field 3 of Set MTGTLOC Field 2 of Set SHIPTGT in ATO. For these missions, the TimePlannedOn and the TimePlannedOn/TimePlannedOff are used to represent the No Eariler Time (NET) and No Later Than Time (NLT) respectively. The Time On Target shall be used for these attributes if NET or NLT is not provided in the ATO.

parameter.name: AirEvents
parameter.semantics: Reference to a new list of orders to be executed. If the order is sucessful, HLA ownership of these events will be transfered to the current owner of this mission.

interactionClass.name: AirMissionCommand
interactionClass.semantics: Requests a change in an AirMission. First, the publisher of this interaction publishes the list of new AirEvents. Next, the publisdher uses this interaction to notify the mission owner of the desired change. Then, the mission owner requests ownership of the AirEvents and adds them to its list of AirEvents. Finally, the mission owner respondes with an AirMissionAcknowledge.

parameter.name: AirMission
parameter.semantics: Reference to the AirMission to be modified.

parameter.name: AdditionType
parameter.semantics:
Defines how these eventis should be added into the current sequence.
"Next" creates new AirEvents that are subordinate to the current event. CancelFlag shall be ignored for these types of additions.
"Append" creates new AirEvents at the end of the current list. If CancelFlag is true and AdditionType is "Append", then the current event and all remaining events in the current list shall be cancelled.
"Insert" creates new AirEvents immediately after the current event. If CancelFlag is true and AdditionType is "Insert", then the current event shall be cancelled and the first element in the inserted list shall become active.

parameter.name: CancelFlag
parameter.semantics: If this is true, then the current AirEvent shall be terminated as part of this order (optional). Assume false if not provided.

interactionClass.name: AirMissionAcknowledge
interactionClass.semantics: If the receiving federation accepts these orders, then an acknowledgement is tranmitted with an acknowledgment of WILCO. But this only happens after the receiving federate has successful obtained ownership.

parameter.name: Acknowledgement
parameter.semantics: Unit's acknowledgement and intension to compliy with orders.

parameter.name: FailureCode
parameter.semantics: Reason for CANTCO.

interactionClass.name: AirliftUpdate
interactionClass.semantics: an update to coordinate intra-theater airlift. This version of the interaction was copied from the JLVCv6v23 FOM for use in AFMSTT's CR 6543 - Intra-Theater Log Visibility project. Is should eventually be replaced by updates to the AirMove AirMissionEvent.

parameter.name: AircraftId
parameter.semantics: RTIObjectId of the aircraft.

parameter.name: MissionNumber
parameter.semantics: AMC Mission Number

parameter.name: Action
parameter.semantics: current status of airlift

parameter.name: Route
parameter.semantics: OPTIONAL. Airlift location or entire route when diverting.

parameter.name: numRoutes
parameter.semantics: The maximum number of routing points in Route

parameter.name: AirBase
parameter.semantics: Unique ID of the airbase.

parameter.name: FlightLineOpenTime
parameter.semantics: The Simtime representing the time the Flightline will be open. If the value is 0 the flightline is open. If the value is -1 then the flightline is closed indefinitely.

parameter.name: Latitude
parameter.semantics: Latitude component of alert location (required)

parameter.name: Longitude
parameter.semantics: Longitude component of alert location (required)

parameter.name: Altitude
parameter.semantics: Destination altitude (in meters) above mean sea level (optional).

parameter.name: MissionNumber
parameter.semantics: The identifying number assigned to a specific mission within an approved project, task, operation, or exercise (optional). May include numbers, letters, spaces, and punctuation (ex: D123HA). Equivalent to FIELD 2 OF SET AMSNDAT (MISSION NUMBER) in the ATO. Blank if no mission is currently assigned.

parameter.name: ATOID
parameter.semantics: Serial number of the ATO from which this aircraft's current mission was defined (optional). Equivalent to the FIELD 3 OF SET MSGID (MESSAGE SERIAL NUMBER) in the ATO. Blank if no mission is currently assigned.

parameter.name: Description
parameter.semantics: Free text portion of ASTAB alert message.

parameter.name: AlertPrority
parameter.semantics: The priority of the Alert

parameter.name: AlertForceIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The side which should receive the Alert

parameter.name: AlertCategory
parameter.semantics: The object type associated with the Alert

parameter.name: AlertObject
parameter.semantics: The unique object associated with the Alert

interactionClass.name: GpsJammingAlert
interactionClass.semantics: This interaction is used to alert AWSIM to the fact that the GEG simulation is jamming GPS signals. In DIS, the GEG simulation implements this using Data PDU and JLVC passes it to AFMSTT as a Data Ineraction from the RRP2-SIMAN module. The JLVC broker translates this into this interaction.

parameter.name: ObjectBeingJammed
parameter.semantics: Reference to the object being jammed.

parameter.name: HorizontalVelocityError
parameter.semantics: Not currently used by AWSIM.

parameter.name: VerticalVelocityError
parameter.semantics: Not currently used by AWSIM.

parameter.name: L1CodeValue
parameter.semantics: Not currently used by AWSIM.

parameter.name: L2CodeValue
parameter.semantics: Not currently used by AWSIM.

enumeratedData.name: AirMissionTypeEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Used to represent primary and secondary air mission types.

enumeratedData.name: MissionStatusEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: AFMSTT mission status as defined in the Flight Status (FLT STAT) column of ASTAB board 5 (Mission Status). Note that this is the same as the the Flight_Status_Type specification in the body of AWSIM's Afmstt_Federation.Flights Ada package.

enumeratedData.name: TaskServiceEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: The code for the service or armed force assigned by a higher authority to complete a task.

enumeratedData.name: ReconnaissanceMissionTypeEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Code for the type of reconnaissance/surveillance mission.

enumeratedData.name: ReconnaissanceCoverageTypeEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Type of reconnaissance/surveillance coverage.

enumeratedData.name: FriendlyMarkingEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: The method of marking friendly positions as a navigational identifier, other friendly identification function, or for protection from friendly fire or aircraft attacks.

enumeratedData.name: MarkingColorEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: The color used to mark friendly positions as a navigational identifier, other friendly identification function, or for protection from friendly fire or aircraft attacks.

enumeratedData.name: ReasonForStopEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Reason for termination of an air move mission.

enumeratedData.name: AirliftActivityEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Reason that an airlift aircraft stops at an airfield.

enumeratedData.name: DeviationReasonEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: The reason an airlift aircraft deviates from a planned path.

enumeratedData.name: TargetCategoryEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Classification of a general group of targets.

enumeratedData.name: ImageryTypeEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Type of imagery recording used in a reconnaisance mission.

enumeratedData.name: ImageQualifierEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: The film based on type of imagery the interpreter is viewing vice the original film negative type.

enumeratedData.name: CrewTypeEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Defines the type of crew used for air missions. The Augmented value is used when total mission time exceeds a basic crew day.

enumeratedData.name: AirliftDeliveryMethodEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: The method of delivery for personnel or cargo by an airlift aircraft.

enumeratedData.name: IntelTaskEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Intelligence task to be performed on a reconnaissance mission.

enumeratedData.name: ReconPurposeEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Purpose of a reconnaissance request.

enumeratedData.name: CoverageExtentAndModeEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Defines the visibility of target and mode of coverage.

enumeratedData.name: FlightTaskedByEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Used by the TaskedBy attribute in the Flight object class. Describes where the current flight behavior originated from.

enumeratedData.name: RulesOfEngagementEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Define the circumstances, conditions, degree, and manner in which force, or actions which might be construed as provocative, may be applied. Free will engage any non-friendly, Tight will engage any identified foe, Hold will not egage any targets.

enumeratedData.name: AirMissionAddEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Defines how this order should be inserted into the current sequence.

enumeratedData.name: AirMissionAcknowledgeEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Based on the RECEIPT/COMPLIANCE CODES in USMTF.

enumeratedData.name: ConvoyUpdateActionEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: convoy actions aligned with MRF

enumeratedData.name: BoundingTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: schedule type

enumeratedData.name: RoutePointStatusEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: Status at route point

enumeratedData.name: RoutePointTypeEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: Type of route point

enumeratedData.name: AlertPriorityEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Defines the Alert priorities

enumeratedData.name: AlertCategoryEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: Defines which objects are associated with the Alert

enumeratedData.name: TimeUsageEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: In ASWIM there are several ways a time can be used. This Enumeration will express which way to use time value. AT, PAT, TIME, END

enumeratedData.name: BingoModeEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: This is a descriptor of how the Bingo Command should be flown. Normal, fly at given speed and altitude. COMBAT and DIRECT.

arrayData.name: RoutePointStructArray1
arrayData.semantics: one or more elements, not to exceed numRoutes, i.e. cardinality [1..numRoutes]

arrayData.name: Munition_Array
arrayData.semantics: An Array of munition types, quantities. Most cases will only have one element in array, but there are cases where there may be two.

field.name: ArrivalTime
field.semantics: OPTIONAL. Not Used for AirliftUpdate Interaction.

field.name: DepartureTime
field.semantics: OPTIONAL. Not Used for AirliftUpdate Interaction.

field.name: BoundingType
field.semantics: OPTIONAL. Enumerated values: ArriveNLT, DepartNET, DelayAtLocation, ScheduleAsDesired

field.name: BoundingTime
field.semantics: OPTIONAL. Offset from current time in minutes for arrival and departure times or number of minutes to delay.

field.name: Status
field.semantics: OPTIONAL. Enumerated values: NotVisited, Enroute, Visited, Loading, Unloading

field.name: PointType
field.semantics: OPTIONAL. Enumerated values: Start, Pickup, DropOff, End

field.name: Description
field.semantics: OPTIONAL. Description of location ? i.e. ICAO, GEOLOC, etc. ? not guaranteed to be filled out or meaningful unless agreed upon in advance.

fixedRecordData.name: MunitionLoadStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: A Data structure that represents a Standard Load Configuration (SCL).

field.name: Quantity
field.semantics: The number of munitions to load

field.name: Munition
field.semantics: The name of the munition to load.

field.name: Member
field.semantics: The aircraft member to load the munition onto

field.name: Faction
field.semantics: The faction to gather the munition from

field.name: LoadFactionOverride
field.semantics: If True, get the muntion from ANY faction
